20110127163556.000|20110127163557.000|CC1|IF YOU JUST THINK ABOUT WHAT

20110127163558.000|20110127163600.000|CC1|THEY LICK THEIR PRIVATE PARTS.

20110127163602.000|20110127163604.000|CC1|AND MANY OTHER ANIMALS.         
20110127163604.000|20110127163606.000|CC1|THEY EAT GARBAGE, ALL OF THAT.

20110127163617.000|20110127163618.000|CC1|WILL, THEY COME IN CONTACT.     
20110127163618.000|20110127163619.000|CC1|WE DON'T HAVE THAT.             
20110127163619.000|20110127163620.000|CC1|SO JUST BEWARE, I'LL TELL ALL   
20110127163620.000|20110127163622.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE WHO LOVE TO KISS

20110127163624.000|20110127163625.000|CC1|OF WHAT THAT DOG DID WITH THE   
20110127163625.000|20110127163626.000|CC1|MOUTH.                          
20110127163626.000|20110127163627.000|CC1|>> LET'S TALETABOUT THE FLU.    
20110127163627.000|20110127163628.000|CC1|CAN YOU CONTRACT THE FLU FROM   
20110127163628.000|20110127163628.000|CC1|YOUR PET?                       
20110127163628.000|20110127163630.000|CC1|>> IT'S FLU SEASON RIGHT NOW AND
20110127163630.000|20110127163632.000|CC1|GENERALLY NO, YOU CAN'T.        
20110127163632.000|20110127163634.000|CC1|EVERY SPECIES HAS STRAINS OF    
20110127163634.000|20110127163635.000|CC1|VIRUSES, INFLUENZA VIRUSES THAT 
20110127163635.000|20110127163637.000|CC1|ARE USUALLY SPECIFIC TO THAT    
20110127163637.000|20110127163637.000|CC1|HOST.                           
20110127163637.000|20110127163639.000|CC1|IT IS POSSIBLE FOR A FLU VIRUS  
20110127163639.000|20110127163641.000|CC1|TO MUTATE OR CHANGE, AND JUMP TO
20110127163641.000|20110127163642.000|CC1|ANOTHER HOST.                   
20110127163642.000|20110127163644.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY WE'VE HAD SWINE FLU, 
20110127163644.000|20110127163646.000|CC1|AND AVIAN FLU.                  
20110127163646.000|20110127163647.000|CC1|THERE IS A CANINE FLU.          
20110127163647.000|20110127163648.000|CC1|BUT RIGHT NOW THERE IS NO       
20110127163648.000|20110127163650.000|CC1|EVIDENCE THAT SHOWS THAT THOSE  
20110127163650.000|20110127163653.000|CC1|FLUS THAT INFECT OUR PETS ARE   
20110127163653.000|20110127163653.000|CC1|CONTAGIOUS TO US.               
20110127163653.000|20110127163654.000|CC1|SO THE ANSWER IS NO.            
20110127163654.000|20110127163656.000|CC1|>> AND APPROACHING PETS CAN BE  
20110127163656.000|20110127163657.000|CC1|VERY DIFFICULT.                 
20110127163657.000|20110127163658.000|CC1|MARTHA STEWART, THERE WAS A     
20110127163658.000|20110127163700.000|CC1|STORY THIS WEEK, MARTHA STEWART,
20110127163700.000|20110127163702.000|CC1|ONE OF HER OWN PETS, YOU SNEAK  
20110127163702.000|20110127163704.000|CC1|UP ON PETS, WHETHER THEY'RE YOUR
20110127163704.000|20110127163706.000|CC1|OWN OR A STRANGE PET THE WRONG  
20110127163706.000|20110127163707.000|CC1|WAY, YOU CAN STARTLE THEM AND   
20110127163707.000|20110127163708.000|CC1|THERE CAN BE A LITTLE BIT OF A  
20110127163708.000|20110127163709.000|CC1|MISHAP.                         
20110127163709.000|20110127163710.000|CC1|>> THAT IS EXACTLY WHAT HAPPENED
20110127163710.000|20110127163711.000|CC1|WITH MARTHA.                    
20110127163711.000|20110127163714.000|CC1|HER DOG WAS FALLING ASLEEP OR   
20110127163714.000|20110127163715.000|CC1|DOZING AND SHE SURPRISED THE    
20110127163715.000|20110127163715.000|CC1|DOG.                            
20110127163715.000|20110127163716.000|CC1|THE DOG REARED UP AND SHE GOT   
20110127163716.000|20110127163718.000|CC1|THAT NASTY LITTLE CUT ON HER    
20110127163718.000|20110127163718.000|CC1|LIP.                            
20110127163718.000|20110127163719.000|CC1|IT IS IMPORTANT NOT TO SURPRISE 
20110127163719.000|20110127163720.000|CC1|YOUR ANIMAL.                    
20110127163720.000|20110127163721.000|CC1|ESPECIALLY AGING ANIMALS,       
20110127163721.000|20110127163722.000|CC1|BECAUSE THEY JUST CAN'T HEAR AS 
20110127163722.000|20110127163723.000|CC1|WELL.                           
20110127163723.000|20110127163723.000|CC1|IT'S ALSO IMPORTANT TO TEACH    
20110127163723.000|20110127163724.000|CC1|YOUR CHILDREN THE CORRECT WAY TO
20110127163724.000|20110127163727.000|CC1|APPROACH AN ANIMAL.             
20110127163727.000|20110127163728.000|CC1|BY AND LARGE THE LARGEST PORTION
20110127163728.000|20110127163730.000|CC1|OF THE POPULATION THAT GETS     
20110127163730.000|20110127163731.000|CC1|BITTEN BY DOGS ARE BOYS AGES 5  
20110127163731.000|20110127163732.000|CC1|TO 9.                           
20110127163732.000|20110127163733.000|CC1|SO YOU CAN GUESS WHY.           
20110127163733.000|20110127163735.000|CC1|THEY'RE LOUD, THEY'RE           
20110127163735.000|20110127163736.000|CC1|BOISTEROUS, THEY'RE AT THE DOG'S
20110127163736.000|20110127163737.000|CC1|EYE LEVEL AND THEY EXHIBIT      
20110127163737.000|20110127163738.000|CC1|INAPPROPRIATE BEHAVIOR.         
20110127163738.000|20110127163740.000|CC1|SO IT'S IMPORTANT TO TEACH YOUR 
20110127163740.000|20110127163741.000|CC1|CHILDREN PROPER ETIQUETTE AROUND
20110127163741.000|20110127163744.000|CC1|YOUR DOG AS WELL AS OTHER DOGS. 
20110127163744.000|20110127163746.000|CC1|>> I GUESS ONE TAKEAWAY FOR KIDS
20110127163746.000|20110127163748.000|CC1|THAT ARE WATCHING AND THEY LOVE 
20110127163748.000|20110127163749.000|CC1|PETS, IS IT TO JUST KIND OF     
20110127163749.000|20110127163751.000|CC1|GENTLY GO UP TO THE DOG AND NOT 
20110127163751.000|20110127163752.000|CC1|BE TOO EXCITABLE AROUND IT?     
20110127163752.000|20110127163754.000|CC1|>> I WOULD SAY DON'T EVER LEAVE 
20110127163754.000|20110127163755.000|CC1|THE CHILD UNSUPERVISED.         
20110127163755.000|20110127163759.000|CC1|AND TEACH THE CHILD TO ASK      
20110127163759.000|20110127163800.000|CC1|PERMISSION TO TOUCH THE DOG.    
20110127163800.000|20110127163802.000|CC1|DON'T JUST RUN UP TO THE DOG.   
20110127163802.000|20110127163804.000|CC1|HE NEEDS TO ASK PERMISSION AND  
20110127163804.000|20110127163805.000|CC1|THEN NEEDS TO GO UP VERY SLOWLY 
20110127163805.000|20110127163806.000|CC1|AND QUIETLY.                    
20110127163806.000|20110127163808.000|CC1|DON'T PULL TAILS.               
20110127163808.000|20110127163809.000|CC1|DON'T PULL FEET.

20110127164227.000|20110127164229.000|CC1|TASTE YOU'VE EVER HAD IN YOUR

20110127164234.000|20110127164235.000|CC1|HAS MAYBE GOSSIPING ABOUT

20110127164811.000|20110127164812.000|CC1|>> BISCUITS.

20110127164814.000|20110127164817.000|CC1|WOMEN WHO ARE FLEXITARRIANS.    
20110127164817.000|20110127164819.000|CC1|THEY'RE NOT LIKE EXTREME        
20110127164819.000|20110127164820.000|CC1|VEGETARIANS BUT THEY LIKE TO CUT
20110127164820.000|20110127164822.000|CC1|DOWN ON THEIR MEAT CONSUMPTION. 
20110127164822.000|20110127164824.000|CC1|THEY LOVE MEAT BUT THEY'RE      
20110127164824.000|20110127164825.000|CC1|WORRIED ABOUT THEIR CHOLESTEROL.
